ygData.subject: RE: Missing Songs!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Ya but GZ lied :)  I have a kit for doing trade skills that raises my Int to 150 (from a base of 85)  I gain a bubble and a half of Mana when I equip it all.
ygData.messageBody:
Ya but GZ lied :) I have a kit for doing trade skills that raises my Int to
150 (from a base of 85) I gain a bubble and a half of Mana when I equip it
all. Case Closed

Rokenn
